The Internet's #1 Defense Against Ad Blockers and Anti-Malware.

Relive the Wild West Days of the Internet!

Remember the golden era of the internet peppered with flashy pop-ups and outrageous ad claims? Miss the thrill of dodging "You're the 1,000,000th Visitor!" banners? Well, fret not‚ÄîAd Blocker Blocker is here to bring all that chaos back to your browser!

üëæ Install on Your Friends' Computer! (please don't)

With modern browsing too sanitized and sleek, this extension aims to inject a dose of good old internet anarchy. Once enabled, Ad Blocker Blocker doesn't just ignore ad blockers‚Äîit revels in creating a spectacle of nuisance pop-ups that are all bark and no bite.

üîß Features:
 ‚Ä¢ Instant nostalgia with vintage-style pop-ups.
 ‚Ä¢ Disable at any time.
 ‚Ä¢ Harmless fun: No real viruses, just virtual annoyances!

üõë Use at Your Own Risk:
This extension is designed for amusement and nostalgia. It's not a real virus, but it will actively sabotage your browsing experience while enabled. Disable it anytime you've had enough retro web chaos.

Bring back the chaos, the annoyance, and the unexpected joy of early internet browsing with Ad Blocker Blocker!
